script.description: Transforms a ZedAI (DAISY 4 XML) document into an EPUB 3 publication.
Transforms DTBook XML into ZedAI XML. Homepage: http://code.google.com/p/daisy-pipeline/wiki/DTBookToZedAI

input.desc: One or more DTBook files to be transformed. In the case of multiple files, a merge will be performed.
input.name: source

option.desc: Filename for the generated MODS file
option.name: opt-mods-filename

option.desc: Filename for the generated CSS file
option.name: opt-css-filename

option.desc: Filename for the generated ZedAI file
option.name: opt-zedai-filename

script.description: Transforms a DAISY 2.02-book into an EPUB3-book.

option.desc: Whether or not to include media overlays and associated audio files (default 'true')
option.name: mediaoverlay

option.desc: Whether or not to include NCX-file and OPF guide element.
option.name: compatibility-mode

script.description: Upgrade a DTBook document from version 1.1.0, 2005-1, or 2005-2 to version 2005-3. This module was imported from the Pipeline 1.
